Uses of IAeExtendedMessageContext in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.receive
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.receive that implement IAeExtendedMessageContext
 class AeExtendedMessageContext
          Extended Message Context supporting the additional information required by our pluggable receive handlers such as those for SOAP messages, including WSRM
